description.value:
Trigger Abendego's Squall matches speed with the Snapdragon

Effect The orca leaps across the Snapdragon and tears its main mast from the deck in the process. This deals @Damage[30] damage to the Snapdragon. All creatures on deck take @Damage[(3d12+4)[bludgeoning]] damage from the shrapnel and must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:28|showdc:gm|basic] save. Abendego's Squall rolls initiative.

details.description: Abendego's Squall leaps from the water. Its mouth opens to snap against any part of the ship that it can reach.
details.disable: @Check[medicine|dc:23] (expert) to remove the harpoon, @Check[nature|dc:23] (trained), or @Check[intimidation|dc:23] (expert) to scare the orca away; two total successes are required to subdue the orca

publication.title: Pathfinder Society Scenario #6-00: Salt of the Ocean

details.reset: The Abendego's Squall returns to hunt down the Snapdragon after 8 hours.
details.routine:
d The Abendego's Squall Leaps over the Snapdragon with each action. When it lands, it deals @Damage[4] damage to the Snapdragon. All creatures on the deck take @Damage[(3d10+40)[bludgeoning]] and must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:28] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage.

Failure The target takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} until the end of its next turn.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} until the end of its next turn.

Speed 30 feet
